pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā sāvatthiyaṃ viharati jetavane anāthapiṇḍikassa ārāme.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭenti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.3: Manussā vihāracārikaṃ āhiṇḍantā passitvā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭessanti, seyyathāpi gihiniyo kāmabhoginiyo”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.5: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhuniyo tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.6: Yā tā bhikkhuniyo appicchā …pe… tā ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.8: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭentī”ti?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.11: kathañhi nāma, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭessanti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.13: evañca pana, bhikkhave, bhikkhuniyo imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddisantu—
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:1.14: “Yā pana bhikkhuniyo dve ekamañce tuvaṭṭeyyuṃ, pācittiyan”ti.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc31:2.1.6: ekāya nipannāya aparā nipajjati, āpatti pācittiyassa.
